scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd careersync-user && npm install" "cd careersync-mentor && npm install" "cd careersync-server && npm install" "cd edu && npm install" "cd educationanb && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "USER,MENTOR,SRV,EDU,ANB" -c "blue,green,magenta,cyan,yellow" "cd careersync-user && npm run dev" "cd careersync-mentor && npm run dev" "cd careersync-server && npm run dev" "cd edu && npm run dev" "cd educationanb && npm run dev"
